title: Overhaul
body:
{{champion:32}} I think Amumu needs a huge makeover. His splash art is old and crumby and his in-game look is just ancient and can't compare to what other champions look like- even some of the older ones like {{champion:6}} Urgot or {{champion:19}} Warwick even.

Anyone agree???

replies.body: uhh ww got a visual update not that long ago
Isn't amumu meant to me an old dude?
They trimmed him up just a few months ago. He looks pretty nice, maybe your graphics aren't on full or something.
Did they? I didn't know about that. Thanks for that.
